name: elixir-document-nodes
description: GraphQL Code Generator plugin for generating Elixir modules with embedded GraphQL document nodes

scripts.version:commit: git add . && git commit -m "v$npm_package_version" && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:patch: pnpm build && pnpm version patch && pnpm version:commit && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
scripts.publish:minor: pnpm build && pnpm version minor && pnpm version:commit && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
scripts.publish:major: pnpm build && pnpm version major && pnpm version:commit && pnpm publish --no-git-checks
